Ketua Umum Ikatan Sarjana Komunikasi Indonesia (ISKI), sekaligus Dekan Fakultas Ilmu Komunikasi Unpad, Dr. Dadang Rahmat Hidayat, pernah ingin jadi wartawan. Karena itu selain kuliah di program jurnalistik, juga belajar hukum, dua duanya lulus. Sayang kemudian harus menjadi dosen, memimpin KPID Jabar, kemudian jadi ketua Komisi Penyiaran Indonesia Pusat. Menghadapi tren media digital ISKI selain ikut kampanye literasi media, di lembaga akademis kemungkinan akan menyesuaikan kurikulum. Today would have been her 100th birthdayâ€¦my favorite Golden Girl, who made it to weeks before the big day, then her heart gave out. Rose never failed to make me laugh, and so, back when we were embarking on our cross-North America ski trip, we named our CanaDream RV â€œThe Betty Whiteâ€. 

Why? Because it made us laugh.

I think of those days often, another worldâ€”when we felt safe traveling and our kids still (mostly) listened to us. Now, years later, when Bettyâ€™s name comes up at family dinners, a big, funny story usually followsâ€¦the perils of skiing out of an RV, parking in Sun Valley next to Range Rovers and Maseratis,  and once, in Jackson, getting called â€œtrailer trashâ€.
